# TextArea
Input fields allow users to input information.

<div style={{display: 'flex', alignItems:'center',justifyContent: 'space-evenly', border: '1px solid #F4F6F8', borderRadius: 16, padding: 32, marginBottom: 24}}>
    <TextAreaImage />
</div>

```xml
<com.waresix.lib.ui.component.atom.TextAreaAV
    android:id="@+id/textArea"
    android:layout_width="match_parent"
    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
    android:maxLength="140" />
```

to set error message

```kotlin
textArea.setErrorMessage("Error message here")
```
